u.a: <dur> hands folded in lap <bef> takes objects from dollhouse .
<aft> sits on knees and puts hands on sides of dollhouse
<aft> puts it back in dollhouse <dur> picks up grill and holds it out to Mother . <bef> drops object to floor . reaches in dollhouse .
continues to take objects from dollhouse
<aft> picks up grill and table from dollhouse
<aft> puts table with other objects on floor
<1w> moves objects on floor . moves dollhouse again . scratches head <1w> moves dollhouse .
<aft> closes door <bef> reaches in dollhouse . pulls dollhouse closer to himself . opens dollhouse door wider .
<1w> puts grill on floor in front of George .
<1w> moves dollhouse . rummages in objects on floor . picks up bed
<aft> manipulates bed in hands <bef> takes bed from Mother .
<1w> rummages in objects . <1w> chin in hand .
<aft> manipulates bed in hand <1w> picks up bed .
<bef> reaches in dollhouse and grasps grill . tips grill over in dollhouse . picks up grill
<aft> puts man in bed in dollhouse
<aft> picks up men and puts them down . continues to rummage
reaches for man Mother put dpwn
<dur> holds man up for Mother to see <bef> picks man up and puts man down . picks up man .
<aft> puts man in bed in dollhouse
<dur> holds man out for Mother to see <bef> holds up other man . reaches for other man . brings man to lap but drops it .
holds man out for Mother to see
picks up object from floor . holds object
<aft> begins to put other men in dollhouse
picks up object and holds it out to George
<bef> puts man at end of finger . picks up man from dollhouse
<1w> puts bed in dollhouse in front of window .
<1w> situates bed . puts dog on bed
<dur> holds out bed to Mother <bef> reaches in dollhouse and picks up bed . dog falls off .
<aft> reaches for objects on floor <bef> puts bed back in dollhouse .
<1w> sets object on edge of dollhouse . balances object on edge of dollhouse
<aft> picks up ladder and leans it against dollhouse
<dur> begins to reach for ladder <bef> touches object Mother had set on edge of dollhouse . reaches in dollhhouse and picks up man .
<1w> moves objects on floor . puts man in car .
<1w> picks up man and holds it for Mother to see
<aft> holds car while George puts man in
takes one man out of car and puts other man in
<1w> moves car away from dollhouse . moves objects out of the way of the car
makes a long sound of a siren
<dur> sets ladder against dollhouse <bef> picks up ladder .
<aft> moves car to ladder and knocks ladder down
<aft> ladder moves <bef> moves car to ladder . takes man from car and puts him to ladder . sets man on ladder .
<dur> manipulates man in hand . puts man on finger tip <bef> takes man from ladder .
<aft> stands man up and pretends to throw water on dollhouse
puts man headfirst into nesting cup and takes nesting cup from Mother
uses different nesting cups while pretending man is throwing water
<1w> shakes nesting cup over house like George does .
<aft> picks up lawn chair <bef> puts nesting cup back with other nesting cups .
<aft> picks up lawn chair and holds it out to George
